channel.title: News on First Baptist Church Muncie
channel.description: Recent content in News on First Baptist Church Muncie

item.title: September Visitor
item.description: The September Visitor is available online.

item.title: Sunday Morning Recap
item.description: Just in case you are considering coming back to in-person worship this fall, here is a quick reminder/recap of what you need to know for Sunday mornings.

item.title: Care Ministry
item.description: by Cheryl Flaherty Due to state restrictions on large gatherings, we will not have the Harvest Dinner in November.

item.title: New Opportunity to Support Missionaries
item.description: Think about supporting the Snells in their new life with Cadence, a group of missionaries that support military families all over the world.

item.title: Pillowcase Project and Other Opportunities for Outreach
item.description: by MaryAnne Bayer The pillowcase project with the YWCA and A Better Way Women has been put on hold due to the COVID virus.

item.title: Visitor Articles
item.description: If you would like an announcement in the November Visitor, please email it to Wade by Sunday, October 18.

item.title: In-Person Check-Ins
item.description: If you have been at church the last week several weeks, you noticed our greeters getting you checked in on iPads.

item.title: Facebook Live Prayer Time
item.description: During this season of social distancing, we continue a weekly Facebook Live prayer time!

item.title: YouTube Channel
item.description: Several videos have been produced to help in this transition.
